label: Services
title: What We Offer
description: At VortixPR, we amplify blockchain, Web3, and AI projects through strategic media engagement. Our global network ensures your message resonates with the right audience.

items.title: Global Press Distribution
items.description: Targeted distribution across top crypto, tech and AI media.

items.title: Asia-Market Localization & Outreach
items.description: CN, KR, JP & SEA outreach with language + narrative adaptation.

items.title: PR & Narrative Strategy
items.description: Angle shaping, headline advice, and editorial review.

items.title: Founder & Personal Branding PR
items.description: Articles, interviews and content for founder authority.

items.title: Influencer Marketing & Community Activation
items.description: Leverage key opinion leaders and build engaged communities around your project.
